    protected Object
    UIViewParameter.getConvertedValue(FacesContext context, Object submittedValue)
    Because this class has no Renderer, leverage the one from the standard HTML_BASIC RenderKit with component-family: jakarta.faces.Input and renderer-type: jakarta.faces.Text and call its Renderer.getConvertedValue(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext, T, java.lang.Object) method.

    UIViewParameter.getStringValueFromModel(FacesContext context)
    Manually perform standard conversion steps to get a string value from the value expression.
